tool_description: Creates short video content from images, text, and audio elements with transitions and effects suitable for social media platforms.

input_images.description: Array of image URLs to include in the video

duration_per_image.description: Duration each image is displayed in seconds (0.5-10.0)

transition_type.description: Transition between images: fade, slide, zoom, dissolve, cut

text_overlays.description: Array of text overlays for each image

loop_video.description: Whether the video should loop seamlessly

error_messages: Input images not accessible: Ensure all URLs in input_images array point to valid image files.
Duration out of range: Use duration_per_image between 0.5 and 10.0 seconds.
Invalid transition type: Use one of [fade, slide, zoom, dissolve, cut].
Background music not accessible: Ensure background_music_url points to a valid audio file.
Invalid aspect ratio: Use one of [16:9, 9:16, 1:1, 4:5].
Frame rate out of range: Use frame_rate between 24 and 60 fps.
Too many images: Maximum 10 images can be processed in one video.
usage: Provide input_images array and configure video parameters like duration, transitions, and resolution. Optionally add background music and text overlays.

video_url.description: URL or path to the created video file

applied_settings.description: Summary of video creation settings used
